login.this_help_us_keep: This helps us keep your account secure by verifying that it's really you.
login.if_you_choose_to_trust: If you choose to trust this device you won't be asked for your 2-step verification for {{days}} days when signing in. You can always change this in settings.

signup.set_up_your_account:
Set up your account and verify your photo ID to
get started on trading crypto.
signup.term: I certify that I am 18 years of age older, I agree to the <0> User Agreement </0> and I have read the <1> Privacy Policy.</1>

emailVerify.verification_email: We sent a verification email to <0>{{email}}</0>. Click the link inside to get started!

twoStepVerification.mobile_number_associated:
Please enter the mobile number associated with your device. We'll
text a verification code to your mobile phone when you sign in.
twoStepVerification.security_term:
Security is critical at Coinhub. To help keep your account safe,
we'll text you a verification code when you sign in on a
new device.
twoStepVerification.text_message_with_digit: A text message with {{digit}}-digit code has been sent to {{phoneNo}}. This helps us keep your account secure by verifying that it's really you.

overivew.tips1: Bitcoin is the world's first widely-adopted cryptocurrency. With Bitcoin, people can securely and directly send each other digital money on the internet.
overivew.tips2: Unlike services like Venmo and PayPal, which rely on the traditional financial system for permission to transfer money and on existing debit/credit accounts, Bitcoin is decentralized: any two people, anywhere in the world, can send Bitcoin to each other without the involvement of a bank, government, or other institution.
overivew.Market_cap: The total market value of a cryptocurrency's circulating supply. It is analogous to the free-float capitalization in the stock market. Market Cap = Current Price x Circulating Supply.
overivew.Volume_(24h): A measure of how much of a cryptocurrency was traded in the last 24 hours.
overivew.Circulating_supply: The amount of coins that are circulating in the market and are in public hands. It is analogous to the flowing shares in the stock market.
overivew.Popularity: Popularity is based on the relative market cap of tradable assets on Coinbase. What this means:Popular assets have a large market cap, which may imply enthusiasm for the asset. Less popular assets may be relatively undiscovered.

coinlisting.asset_Coinhub: You're a few steps away from integrating your asset with Coinhub
coinlisting.listed_Coinhub: Apply to get listed on Coinhub for trading
coinlisting.submitting_Adres1: Thank your for choosing to list your asset on Coinhub.We're excited to hear from you. We encourage you to review the help'  articles on this page to prepare for the listing process.
coinlisting.submitting_Adres2: This process will walk you through the application, from signing our listing agreement to providing general information on your asset along with the details for our compliance, legal, and security teams to review.
coinlisting.listing_Text: By signing this agreement, you agree that the information you provide is truthful. you agree to abide by the terms of the agreement (including but not limited to the non-disclosure provision, the restriction on market manipulation, and the obligation not to use any of the information you receive for or allow a third party to engage in market manipulation). Please read this document over carefully
coinlisting.network_token: What network is your token build on?
coinlisting.digital_asset: What is the name of your digital asset?
coinlisting.asset_tickerText: What ticker is associated with your asset? Must be between 2-5 letters.
coinlisting.upload_text: Upload an icon, File should be a PNG,JPEG,JPG no larger than 500KB.
coinlisting.provide_company: Provide the full name of your company.
coinlisting.provide_incorporation: Provide the company's address of incorporation
coinlisting.executives_text: Add each executive of the company. For each, include full name,date of birth, and links to any relevant online or social media profiles(e.g. Linkedin, Twitter, GitHub, personal website).
coinlisting.beneficial_text: Excluding company executives, add every board member and each investor who owns 10% or more of the company. For each, include full name and links to any relevant online or social media profiles(e.g. LinkedIn, Twitter, GitHub, personal website).
coinlisting.asset_trading_text: Does your company or any related entity participate in the asset markets, either directly or indirectly on your behalf(e.g. proprietary trading, market making)?
coinlisting.government_connections_text: Has your company or project received any sponsorship, assistance or financial contributions from any government entity or political figure?
coinlisting.list_desc: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source.

Password must be a minimum of 8 characte: Password must be a minimum of 8 characters including number, upper, lower and one special character

decode_and_verify.expired: Your email link is expired.Request a new link.

send&Receive.note3: Send only {{currency}} to this address. Sending any other coin or token to this address may result in loss of your assets.
send&Receive.note6: Do not send directly to a crowdfund or ICO address, as your account will not be Credited with tokens from such sales.
send&Receive.note7: Receiving amount should be total of minimum receivable plus the receiving fee.
send&Receive.note8: For example: If you receive 100 {{currency}} and the receiving fee is 2%, then the receiving amount should be at least 102 {{currency}}.
send&Receive.note9: No platform fees will be incurred for internal user's transactions.

addressBook.desc: Easily access your saved addresses for withdrawals. Label and save each address.

referral.welcome_referral: Welcome to the Crypto Referral program.
referral.invite_friends: Invite friends to trade on Coinhub and earn commission on their first trading and receiving transactions.
referral.rules: Rules: Share your Lite Referral ID / link with a friend who does not have account with Coinhub.
referral.rule_sub_contant: Share your Referral ID/link with a friend who doesn’t have an account with Coinhub exchange. The rewards can be earned by performing any of the below tasks:
referral.kyc_completed: Note: The user must complete the identity verification to be eligible to apply for redemption of rewards. The reward amount is withdrawable when the total accumulated rewards are equivalent or more than <0>{{minRedemptionAmount}}</0>
referral.verify: Invite friends to sign up and verify the account. Referee will be rewarded <0>{{reward}}</0>  and Referrer will be rewarded <0>{{reward2}}</0>   on successful identity verification.
referral.deposit: When the referee’s first receiving amount is more than<0>{{deposit}}</0> both referrer and referee, Referee  will receive rewards up to <0>{{depositCurr}}</0> and Referrer will be rewarded up to <0>{{depositReferrer}}</0>
referral.trade: When the referee's first trade is more than  <0>{{trade}}</0> both referrer and referee, Referee will receive rewards up to  <0>{{tradeCurr}}</0> and Referrer will be rewarded  <0>{{tradeReferrer}}</0>

device_management_page.heading: Device Management
device_management_page.desc: These devices are currently allowed to access your account

account_activity_page.heading: Account Activity
account_activity_page.desc: These devices are currently allowed to access your account

rewards.reward_content: To be eligible for rewards, each new user can earn by performing any of the below tasks
rewards.identity: Sign up and complete the identity verification, the user will be rewarded
rewards.deposit: On the first receiving amount of above  <0>{{deposit}}</0> the user will get a chance to earn rewards up to  <0>{{depositCurr}}</0>
rewards.trade: On the first trade of above <0>{{trade}}</0>  the user will get a chance to earn rewards up to <0>{{tradeCurr}}</0>

overview.no_of_friends: Number of Friends Signed Up Successfully
overview.redeem_modal_par: The reward will be soon credited into your spot account.

landing.title: INTEGRATED MARKETS
landing.crypto_headline2: Secure storage and transfer of cryptocurrency
landing.new_to_bitcointop: Evo Europe Exchange is the easiest place to get started.
landing.get_started: Evo Europe Exchange knows the importance of security and builds an infinitely safe haven for all its users to keep their digital currency out of harm’s way.
landing.new_to_bitcoin: New to Bitcoin ? Evo Europe Exchange is the easiest place to get started.
landing.markets_desc: Trade in major crypto markets like BTC, ETH, USDT, LTC, DASH, BCH, Evo Europe, XRP and amplify your profits. Choose from multiple trading pairs to diversify your portfolio.
landing.wallet_desc: Security is paramount to us. The multi-cryptocurrency, encrypted wallet integrated into the exchange allows secure storage and transfer of funds.
landing.engine_desc: Evo Europe Exchange offers you a robust matching engine that is raring to go. It is capable of matching buy and sell orders with minimum latency.
landing.two_factor_desc: It has never been easier to protect your assets. Our advanced security solution like two-factor authentication allows authenticated user access and transactions.
landing.graph_desc: Never lose sight of what you are doing. Get a real-time, graphical view of your trades. Leverage the flexibility to filter data according to hours and minutes.
landing.referral_desc: Has a good deed brought you any money? This will! Refer Evo Europe Exchange to your friends and family and get referral rewards without investing a dime.
landing.about: Evo Europe Exchange is a platform for everyone who wants to simply buy and sell Bitcoins. Instant buy/sell of Bitcoins at fair price is guaranteed.
landing.maintextSub: We provide an easy and secure platform for buying and trading cryptocurrencies.

easeConvenience.easeConvenienceDetail: Trade cryptocurrencies seamlessly on your PC or mobile device.

signupProcess.signupProcessDetail: With just a few clicks, you can create your account and start using our services.

cryptoPortfolia.cryptoPortfoliaDetail: Manage all your digital currencies from one place.

secure.secureDetail: Our encryption and storage system keep your assets safe and secure.

aboutUs.title: Our history
aboutUs.detail: In this digital age, we have the power to revolutionize the way we handle our assets. With blockchain technology, we can easily transfer, spend, and store our wealth. The use of virtual assets is rapidly growing, and a team of COINHUB is striving to provide the same opportunities to Mongolians.

spotTrading.title: Spot Trading
spotTrading.detail: Coinhub offers a comprehensive set of powerful tools for trading cryptocurrencies.

cryptoDerivatives.title: Crypto Derivatives
cryptoDerivatives.detail: Coinhub offers the most reliable and efficient platform for trading crypto futures.

quickTransfer.title: Quick Transfer
quickTransfer.detail: Enjoy our quick, easy, and secure transactions.

coinhubEarn.title: Coinhub Earn
coinhubEarn.detail: Generate a steady income by staking your current asset.

coinhubWallet.title: Coinhub Wallet
coinhubWallet.detail: With Coinhub Wallet, you can transfer cryptocurrencies across different networks.

chbToken.title: CHB token
chbToken.detail: Anyone who possesses CHB tokens is eligible to receive a weekly reward.

coinhubApp.title: Trade with ease & convenience
coinhubApp.detail: With our user-friendly mobile app, you can easily trade various cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB, and more. Our platform provides a seamless experience, allowing you to buy and sell cryptocurrencies with just a few taps on your mobile device. Enjoy real-time market data, secure transactions, and a range of trading options. Start trading today and take advantage of the dynamic world of cryptocurrencies.

tradingPlatform.title: Trading platform
tradingPlatform.detail: Coinhub offers a wide range of features and tools for advanced traders as well as beginners.

Chbtoken.title: CHB token
Chbtoken.detail: Anyone who possesses CHB tokens is eligible to receive a weekly reward.

launchpad.title: Launchpad
launchpad.detail: Launchpad platform designed to assist new cryptocurrency startups in raising funds to launch their products or services.

businessPartners.title: Business partners
businessPartners.detail: Coinhub partners with multiple international liquidity providers to enhance its trading capabilities.

supportCenter.title: Support center
supportCenter.detail: Our support center is dedicated to solving all of your problems as quickly and efficiently as possible.

community.title: Community
community.detail: COINHUB community is the best place to connect, learn, and grow together.

forgot_password.title: Reset Password
forgot_password.withdrawals: *Any withdraw action is not available after 24 hours of password change.

about_footer.title: About {{title}}
about_footer.processing: Capable of processing multiple transactions in a second
about_footer.web: Web, Android, iOS, Mobile Web, Windows, Mac
about_footer.support: Both left to right and right to left languages
about_footer.team_record: Evo Europe Exchange is backed by an expert team with rich experience and in-depth knowledge of cryptocurrency and finance industries.
about_footer.products_record: Evo Europe Exchange has been rigorously tested with a large user base on parameters like security, speed, performance, and user experience.
about_footer.superior_record: Our robust matching engine is powered to process multiple transactions in a second, making Evo Europe Exchange one of the fastest exchange platforms.
about_footer.partners_record: We have solid relationships with industry leaders, simply look at the list of investors and advisors who are willing to stand behind our platform.
about_footer.multilayer_security: Evo Europe Exchange has security built right in with advanced technologies that work together in harmony to deliver world-class security.

terms_footer.title: TERMS & CONDITIONS
terms_footer.last_revised: This agreement is between you and the service operator, Evo Europe. By using any services made available through the Evo Europe website (https://app-stage.Evo Europe.org), API (https://app-stage.Evo Europe.org),  Evo Europe affiliates, you agree that you have read, understood and accepted all of the terms and conditions contained in this Terms of Use agreement, as well as our Privacy Policy and Consent Form which have incorporated the GDPR regulation. As this is a legally binding contract, please carefully read through this agreement and related notices before using any of our Services. By registering, accessing or using Evo Europe, you have agreed to the terms and conditions as laid out in this User Agreement. Should you disagree to this User Agreement, please proceed to initiate the account lock function (for existing users) and stop the usage of Evo Europex and any of its services.
terms_footer.title_second: For more information on Evo Europex, you can refer to the company and license information found on the website. If you have questions regarding this agreement, please feel free to contact Evo Europex for clarification via our Customer Support team.
terms_footer.agreement_title: Evo Europe AG is a company duly incorporated under the laws of Switzerland with company registration number CHE-195-195.664 and official address at Dammstrasse 16, CH-6300, Zug, Switzerland (“Evo Europe”, “We”, “Us”, “Our” or “XM”). Evo Europe is a Swiss regulated financial intermediary, providing services in the area of Digital Assets, and is subject to the rules set out by the Financial Services Standards Association (“VQF”).
terms_footer.agreement_title2: The following terms and conditions (the “Terms”) incorporated herein, set forth the rights and obligations of the business relationship between Evo Europe and the Client (“Client”, “You” or “Your”) (the “Business Relationship”), subject to any special agreements between the Client and Evo Europe.
terms_footer.title_one: By registering to use a Evo Europex Account, you have affirmed that you are at least 18 years old and are an individual, legal person or other organization with full legal capacity to enter into this User Agreement between you and Evo Europex. If you are not, you and your guardian shall undertake all consequences resulting from your actions and Evo Europex shall have the right to cancel or freeze your account in addition to filing claims against you and your guardian for compensation.
terms_footer.title_2: By accessing and using Evo Europex and any of its services, you acknowledge and declare that you are not on any trade or economic sanctions lists, such as the United Nations Security Council Sanctions List and its equivalent. Evo Europex maintains the right to select its markets and jurisdictions to operate and may restrict or deny its services to certain countries. The content of this Agreement shall not be excluded from the laws of the country under which the user belongs. Evo Europex maintains its stance that prohibited users are not to use or access Evo Europex and any of its services.
terms_footer.title_4: Evo Europex provides an online digital asset trading platform (crypto to crypto) for products commonly known as cryptographic tokens, digital tokens or cryptographic currency. Evo Europex does not provide fiat trading capabilities on its platform and as such is not subjected to the stringent regulations that come with it. Evo Europex functions as a trading platform provider and is not a buyer or seller in trades made between traders. Evo Europex is also not a market maker. Traders must register and open an account with Evo Europex and deposit digital assets prior to commencement of trading. Traders may request the withdrawal of their digital assets, subject to the limitations as stated in the Terms and Conditions.
terms_footer.title_5: Evo Europex strives to maintain the accuracy of information posted on its website however it cannot guarantee the accuracy, suitability, reliability, completeness, performance or fitness for purpose of the content through the website, and will not accept liability for any loss or damage that may arise directly or indirectly from the content. Information on Evo Europex website can be subjected to change without notice and is provided for the primary purpose of facilitating users to arrive at independent decisions. Evo Europex does not provide investment or advisory advice and will have no liability for the use or interpretation of information as stated in its website or other communication mediums. All users of Evo Europex must understand that there are risks involved in trading. Evo Europex encourages all users to exercise prudence and trade responsibly within their own means.
terms_footer.title_6: While Evo Europex emphasises platform security to ensure the continuity and security of its services (announcements will be made in event of downtime/maintenance), it will be non-accountable to Act of God, malicious targeted hacking, terrorist attacks and other unforeseen circumstances. Evo Europex reserves the right to cancel, rollback or block transactions of all type on its platform in event of abnormal transactions. Evo Europex will not ask for any password from its users nor ask users to transfer funds that are not listed on its trading platform. Users are encouraged to exercise prudence in dealing with discounts or promotions that could lead to them getting scammed. While the list is non-exhaustive, you agree that Evo Europex will not be held responsible for any losses arising from the situations stated above.
terms_footer.title_7: By using Evo Europex and any of its services, you declare that all information to Evo Europex in connection with these Terms are true, accurate and complete.
terms_footer.title_10: All users must register (https://app-stage.Evo Europe.org/user-registration) for a Evo Europex Account before using the site. To register for an account, you must provide your real name, email address and password, as well as accept the Terms of Use, Privacy Policy and Consent Form. Depending on certain conditions and in our sole discretion, we may refuse to open an account for you.
terms_footer.title_12: With registration of an account on Evo Europex, you agree to share personal information requested for the purposes of identity verification. This information is used specifically for the detection of money laundering, terrorist financing, fraud and other financial crimes on the Evo Europex platform. In addition to providing this information, to facilitate compliance with global industry standards for data retention, you agree to permit us to keep a record of such information for the lifetime of your account plus 5 years beyond account closing. You also authorise us to make inquiries, either directly or through third parties, that are deemed necessary to verify your identity or to protect you and/or us against financial crimes such as fraud.
terms_footer.title_13: The Identity Verification information we request may include, but is not limited to, your: Name, Email Address, Contact Information, Telephone Number, Username, Government Issued ID. In providing this required information, you confirm that it is accurate and authentic. Post-registration, you must guarantee that the information is truthful, complete and updated in a timely manner with any changes. If there is any reasonable doubt that any information provided by you is wrong, untruthful, outdated or incomplete, Evo Europex shall have the right to send you a notice to demand corrections, remove relevant information directly and, as the case may be, terminate all or part of Evo Europex Service to you. You shall be solely and fully responsible for any loss or expenses incurred during the use of Evo Europex Service if you cannot be reached through the contact information provided. You hereby acknowledge and agree that you have the obligation to keep all information provided up to date if there are any changes.
terms_footer.title_15: Evo Europex accounts can only be used by the person whose name they are registered under. Evo Europex reserves the right to suspend, freeze or cancel accounts that are used by persons other than the persons whose names they are registered under. Accordingly, Evo Europex will not take legal responsibility for these accounts.
terms_footer.title_17: Evo Europex prioritizes maintaining the safety of those user funds entrusted to us and has implemented industry standard protections for our platform. With that said, there are account-level risks that are created by individual user actions. We request that you understand the need to independently take safety precautions to protect your own account and personal information.
terms_footer.title_18: You shall be solely responsible for the safekeeping of your Evo Europex account and password on your own, and you shall be responsible for all activities under your log-in email, Evo Europex account and password (including but not limited to information disclosure, information posting, consent to or submission of various rules and agreements by clicking on the website, online renewal of agreement, etc.).
terms_footer.title_20: (a). you will notify Evo Europex immediately if you are aware of any unauthorized use of your Evo Europex account and password by any person or any other violations to the security rules;
terms_footer.title_21: (b). you will strictly observe the security, authentication, dealing, charging, withdrawal mechanism or procedures of the website/service; and
terms_footer.title_22: (c). you will log out from the website by taking proper steps at the end of every visit.
terms_footer.title_23: Evo Europex will not be responsible for any loss or consequences caused by your failure to comply with the above Account Security provision.
terms_footer.title_25: Evo Europex reserves the right to resolve issues and disputes at its sole discretion. Some issues include infringement of others’ rights, violation of laws and regulations, abnormal trades and others not explicitly mentioned in the Terms. Users agree to bear the costs arising from the process of dispute resolution.
terms_footer.title_26: GUIDELINES FOR USAGE OF SERVICES ON Evo Europex
terms_footer.title_27: You hereby agree to observe the following covenants during your use of services on Evo Europex:
terms_footer.listing_1: All the activities that you carry out during the use of Evo Europex Service will be in compliance with the requirements of applicable laws, regulations, as well as the various guidelines of Evo Europex,

Examples of such malicious acts include, but are not limited to

terms_footer.listing_6: executing malicious sales or purchases on the market By accessing the Evo Europex Service, you agree that Evo Europex shall have the right to unilaterally determine whether you have violated any of the above covenants and take actions to apply relevant rules without receiving your consent or giving prior notice to you. If, due to any alleged violation Evo Europex incurs any losses, is claimed by any third party for compensation or suffers any punishment imposed by any administrative authorities, you shall indemnify Evo Europex against any losses and expense caused thereby, including reasonable attorney’s fee.
terms_footer.title_30: Evo Europex reserves the rights to levy service fees on users who use its services. It is in the discretion of Evo Europex to adjust the servce fees charged to users using its services.
terms_footer.title_33: Evo Europex will provide Evo Europex Service at an “as is” and “commercially available” condition, and does not offer any form of warranty with regards to the Service’s reliability, stability, accuracy and completeness of the technology involved. Evo Europex serves merely as a venue of transactions where coin-related information can be acquired and coin-related transactions can be conducted. Evo Europex cannot control the quality, security or legality of the coin involved in any transaction, truthfulness of the transaction information, or capacity of the parties to any transaction to perform their obligations under the rules. You must carefully consider the associated investment risks, legal status and validity of the transaction information and investment decisions prior to your use of the Evo Europex Services provided.
terms_footer.title_35: You acknowledge and agree, Evo Europex shall not be liable for any of your losses caused by any of the following events, including but not limited to:

terms_footer.title_53: Should the account be terminated, the account & transactional information required for meeting data retention standards will be securely stored for five years. terms_footer.title_56: Once the account is closed/withdrawn, all remaining balance (which includes charges and liabilities owed to Evo Europex) on the account will be payable at once to Evo Europex. terms_footer.title_58: Evo Europex maintains full custody of the funds and user data/information which may be turned over to the authorities in event of account suspension/closure arising from fraud investigations, AML investigations or violation of Evo Europex's Terms (eg. trading on Evo Europex from a sanctioned country).
terms_footer.title_60: It is the responsibility of the user to abide by local laws in relation to the legal usage of Evo Europex in their local jurisdiction. Users must also factor, to the extent of their local law all aspects of taxation, the withholding, collection, reporting and remittance to their appropriate tax authorities. All users of Evo Europex and any of its services acknowledge and declare that the source of their funds come from a legitimate manner and are not derived from illegal activities. Evo Europex maintains a stance of cooperation with law enforcement authorities globally and will not hesitate to seize, freeze, terminate the account and funds of users which are flagged out or investigated by legal mandate.
terms_footer.title_62: Evo Europex may announce and amend its privacy policy on the platform of Evo Europex from time to time and the privacy policy shall be an integral part of this Usage Agreement. The latest version of the Privacy Policy which has included the GDPR can always be found here on this page (https://app-stage.Evo Europe.org/privacy_policies).
terms_footer.title_64: You agree to indemnify Evo Europex and its entirety of affiliates and hold them harmless from and against all third party claims except from Evo Europex’s breach of these Terms. As mentioned in description of services, Evo Europex strives its best to maintain the data integrity on its site but does not guarantee the information and services provided in its platform. Evo Europex will not be liable for errors arising from the use of its services.
terms_footer.title_66: If you have any complaints, feedback or questions, kindly contact https://app-stage.Evo Europe.org/contact and we will in our best efforts try to resolve it for you.

privacy_footer.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_footer.title1: This Privacy Policy explains how Evo Europex Holdings Limited (“Evo Europex”) collects, uses, shares, and protects user information obtained through the Evo Europe.org website. The terms “we,” “us,” and “our” refer to Evo Europex Holdings Limited and its affiliates. When we ask for certain personal information from users it is because we are required by law to collect this information or it is relevant for specified purposes. Any non-required information you provide to us is done so voluntarily. You decided whether to provide us with these non-required information; you may not be able to access or utilize all of our Services if you choose not to.
privacy_footer.title2: By using the Site, you consent to the data practices described in this Privacy Policy. On occasion, Evo Europex may revise this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in law or our personal data collection and use practices. If material changes are made to this Privacy Policy, the changes will be announced by posting on the site. We will ask for your consent before using your information for any purpose that is not covered in this Privacy Policy.
privacy_footer.title3: The latest privacy policy has incorporated elements from the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) as we act in accordance to its personal information processing rules within the European Economic Area (EEA).
privacy_footer.title5: We want you to understand the types of information we collect when you register for and use Evo Europex's services
privacy_footer.title6: 1. Information you provide to us at registration
privacy_footer.title7: When you create a Evo Europex Account, you provide us with personal information that includes your contact information (Email Address, name, and a password). You can also choose to add a phone number for SMS or Google Authenticator account to be used for 2FA verification for improved security.
privacy_footer.title8: 2. Information we collect when authenticating user identity
privacy_footer.title9: To comply with global industry regulatory standards including Anti-Money Laundering (AML), Know-Your-Customer (KYC), and Counter Terrorist Financing (CTF), Evo Europex requires user accounts to undergo user identity authentication for both Personal & Enterprise-level accounts. This entails collecting formal identification.
privacy_footer.title10: 3. Information we collect as you use our services
privacy_footer.information_title: Through your use of the Evo Europex platform, we also monitor and collect tracking information related to usage such as access date & time, device identification, operating system, browser type and IP address. This information may be directly obtained by Evo Europex or through third party services. This service usage data helps us our systems to ensure that our interface is accessible for users across all platforms and can aid during criminal investigations.
privacy_footer.information_title2: For all personal and enterprise user accounts, we collect transaction information including deposit snapshots, account balances, trade history, withdrawals, order activity and distribution history. This transaction data is monitored for suspicious trading activity for user fraud protection, and legal case resolution.
privacy_footer.information2: WHY DOES Evo Europex COLLECT THIS INFORMATION.
privacy_footer.info_collects_title: 1. To provide and maintain our services
privacy_footer.new_one: We use the information collected to deliver our services and verify user identity. We use the IP address and unique identifiers stored in your device’s cookies to help us authenticate your identity and provide our service. Given our legal obligations and system requirements, we cannot provide you with services without data like identification, contact information and transaction-related information.
privacy_footer.info_collects_your: We use the information collected to protect our platform, users’ accounts and archives. We use IP addresses and cookie data to protect against automated abuse such as spam, phishing and Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attacks..
privacy_footer.info_collects_your_one: We analyse trading activity with the goal of detecting suspicious behavior early to prevent potential fraud and loss of funds to bad actors..
privacy_footer.protect_collects_title: 3. To comply with legal and regulatory requirements
privacy_footer.protect_collects: Respect for the privacy and security of data you store with Evo Europex informs our approach to complying with regulations, governmental requests and user-generated inquiries. We will not disclose or provide any personal information to third party sources without review from our legal case team and/or prior consent from the user.
privacy_footer.cookies_collects: We actively measure and analyse data to understand how our services are used. This review activity is conducted by our operations team to continually improve our platform’s performance and to resolve issues with the user experience. We continuously monitor our systems’ activity information and communications with users to look for and quickly fix problems.
privacy_footer.use_cookies: We use personal information collected, like an email address to interact with users directly when providing customer support on a ticket or to keep you informed on log ins, transations, and security. Without processing your personal information for confirming each communication, we will not be able to respond to your submitted requests, questions and inquiries. All direct communications are kept confidential and reviewed internally for accuracy.
privacy_footer.third_party_title: 6. To enforce our Terms of Use and other agreements
privacy_footer.third_party: It is very important for us and our customers that we continually review, investigate and prevent any potentially prohibited or illegal activities that violate our Terms of Service. For the benefit of our entire user base, we carefully enforce our agreements with third parties and actively investigate violations of our posted Terms of Use. Evo Europex reserves the right to terminate the provision of service to any user found engaging in activities that violate our Terms of Use.
privacy_footer.third_party_link_title: HOW DOES Evo Europex PROTECT USER DATA
privacy_footer.third_party_link: Evo Europex has implemented a number of security measures to ensure that your information is not lost, abused, or altered. Our data security measures include, but are not limited to: PCI Scanning, Secured Sockets Layered encryption technology, pseudonymisation, internal data access restrictions, and strict physical access controls to buildings & files. Please note that it is impossible to guarantee 100% secure transmission of data over the Internet nor method of electronic storage. As such, we request that you understand the responsibility to independently take safety precautions to protect your own personal information.
privacy_footer.google_title: If you suspect that your personal information has been compromised, especially account and/or password information, please lock your account and contact Evo Europex customer service immediately.
privacy_footer.california_title: We are committed to respecting the freedoms and rights of all our Evo Europex users who have placed their trust in our service. If you should have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, or if you would like to file a Data Protection request, please refer to our FAQ and contact us on our Support Page.

btc_currency.detail: Bitcoin is a cryptocurrency and a digital payment system invented by an unknown programmer, or a group of programmers, under the name Satoshi Nakamoto.It was released as open-source software in 2009.The system is peer-to-peer, and transactions take place between users directly, without an intermediary. These transactions are verified by network nodes and recorded in a public distributed ledger called a blockchain. Since the system works without a central repository or single administrator, bitcoin is called the first decentralized digital currency.Besides being created as a reward for mining, bitcoin can be exchanged for other currencies, products, and services in legal or black markets.As of February 2015, over 100,000 merchants and vendors accepted bitcoin as payment. According to research produced by Cambridge University in 2017, there are 2.9 to 5.8 million unique users using a cryptocurrency wallet, most of them using bitcoin.

eth_currency.detail: Ethereum (ETH) is an open-source, public, blockchain-based distributed computing platform featuring smart contract (scripting) functionality, which facilitates online contractual agreements. Ethereum also provides a cryptocurrency token called "ether", which can be transferred between accounts and used to compensate participant nodes for computations performed. "Gas", an internal transaction pricing mechanism, is used to mitigate spamand allocate resources on the network.The value token of the Ethereum blockchain is called ether. It is listed under the diminutive ETH and traded on cryptocurrency exchanges. It is also used to pay for transaction fees and computational services on the Ethereum network.

usdt_currency.detail: USDT is a crypto-currency asset issued on the Bitcoin blockchain via the Omni Layer Protocol. Each USDT unit is backed by a U.S Dollar held in the reserves of the Tether Limited and can be redeemed through the Tether Platform. USDT can be transferred, stored, spent, just like Bitcoins or any other crypto-currency.USDT and other Tether currencies were created to facilitate the transfer of national currencies, to provide users with a stable alternative to Bitcoin and to provide an alternative for exchange and wallet audits which are currently unreliable. USDT provides an alternative to Proof of Solvency methods by introducing a Proof of Reserves Process. In the Tether Proof of Reserves system, the amount of USDT in circulations can be easily checked on the Bitcoin blockchain via the tools provided at Omnichest.info, while the corresponding total amount of USD held reserves is proved by publishing the bank balance and undergoing periodic audits by professionals.

zfl_currency.detail: Launched on 08/01/2018 by a team based in Estonia and Asia, ZFL aims to address Trading and Finance under One Platform in several regions. ZFL will allow Zedxe.com platform users to improve efficiency, error reduction, time savings, and straight-through processing without any intermediaries, and with AI (Artificial Intelligence) Management tools.

margin_mode.note1: Switching the margin mode will only apply it to the selected contract.
margin_mode.note2: All cross positions under the same margin asset share the same asset cross margin balance. In the event of liquidation, your assets full margin balance along with any remaining open positions under the asset may be forfeited.
margin_mode.note3: Manage your risk on individual positions by restricting the amount of margin allocated to each. If the margin ratio of a position reached 100%, the position will be liquidated. Margin can be added or removed to positions using this mode.
margin_mode.note4: The margin mode cannot be changed while you have an open order/position

leverage.note1: Maximum position at current leverage: 40,000,000 USDT
leverage.note2: Please note that leverage changing will also apply for open positions and open orders.
leverage.note3: Selecting higher leverage such as [10x] increases your liquidation risk. Always manage your risk levels. See our help article for more information.
leverage.note4: Leverage reduction is not supported with open positions in Isolated Margin Mode.

fq.title: FAQ
fq.Q1: Q1. What is the business case for introducing (or migrating parts to) blockchain?
fq.ans1: Reduced audit cost, lesser marketing budget (most of which is spent in faking numbers), reduced accounting cost, reduced compliance cost, faster business growth, better financial reconciliation
fq.Q2: Q2. Should blockchain always be public?
fq.ans2: No. It can be access controlled.
fq.Q3: Q3. How can we prevent wallets from being hacked?
fq.ans3: You may implement multiple factor authentication. At the end of the day, what happens if a user posts his credit card pin on his social media? It's the same thing.
